scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.build-server: cd server && npm run build && ncp ./dist/ ../dist
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm run build && ncp ./dist/ ../dist/src/client/
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
